channel.title: Wanting to learn some basci things about computers
channel.description:
hey I no really nothing about computers and seeing as I am wanting to get in to doing some very nice SRL SCAR scripts, I figured I should leanr some stuff about computers and instead of paying some one to teach me I thought i would ask you guys.
The first thing i want to now is what does GHz mean and whats does RAM mean?
apparently my computer has 2.8GHz and504MB of RAM so what does that actually mean?

item.title: Wanting to learn some basci things about computers
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

Coolnoob55:

When it comes to computers, ask me ;). GHz is the number of clock cycles your processor can take on in a second, apparently, you computer can take on 2.8 billion clock cycles per second which compared to other computers nowadays is crap

EXCUSE ME?!??!?! I have 1.4Ghz!

Read full topic
item.source: Wanting to learn some basci things about computers

item.title: Wanting to learn some basci things about computers
item.dc:creator: @billfred1114 billfred1114
item.description:
@billfred1114 wrote:

frank i think it sounds cool, doesnt mean i was going to use it to get chicks.

you know some people do things beacause they wont to not beacause it makes themselve look good.

you might want to look into that self esteem issue.

and what makes you think i wont be going to store a ‘ton of crap’

and another thing whats with steriotyping girls what makes you think there not into computers.

but perhaps you wernt steriotyping girls just computer iliterate ones thinking that someone would not want to impress them.

do you think there ugly or are you afraid of a famle that might be smarterr then you?

Read full topic
item.source: Wanting to learn some basci things about computers

item.title: Wanting to learn some basci things about computers
item.dc:creator: @Kryptizzler Kryptizzler
item.description:
@Kryptizzler wrote:

If you don’t have that much to spend, and all you want to do is program, you don’t need that much. Scar is like, tiny lol. The main harddrive consumer is the operating system.

Read full topic
item.source: Wanting to learn some basci things about computers

item.title: Wanting to learn some basci things about computers
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“billfred1114, post:13, topic:4660”]i still would like 1TB of space just sounds kool[/quote]That… is the stupidest thing I have read today.

“Ooh yea I have a one terabyte hard drive”, gee that does sound cool doesnt it!! you will get all the chicks!!!

unless you are actually going to store a ton of crap, you wouldnt even need 500mb…

Read full topic

item.description:
@billfred1114 wrote:

filled with games music and movies it wouldnt be that hard to fill it up

i could build my own with help from a friend of mine but the dell looks kool.

item.title: Wanting to learn some basci things about computers
item.dc:creator: @Coolnoob55 Coolnoob55
item.description:
@Coolnoob55 wrote:

billfred1114:

i am probbly going for kool looking XPS 700 with pentium 4 precessor 3.80GHz 1TB on Hardrive 4GB RAM i think it is aboout 4-5k but that is ok because i had a limit of ten grand. hope full i t will be fast enough to do what i want it to do

Build your own!!! You’ll probably have the computer of your dreams, and save ALOT of $$$ maybe $400-1.5k. Except, you seem like a person who knows little of computers, so I don’t think you’ll be doing that anytime soon. 1TB of space is over excessive, unless you have a library of porn

Read full topic

item.source: Wanting to learn some basci things about computers

item.title: Wanting to learn some basci things about computers
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

You dont need to spend lots of money to get a decent computer. Theres absolutely nothing wrong with using a processor that is under 3.0GHz or having less than 1Gb RAM.

To write any program you dont even need whats classed as a low-end computer, the computer that my brother uses is a P2 233MHz and only has around 20MB RAM, it gets its job done.

Read full topic
item.source: Wanting to learn some basci things about computers

item.title: Wanting to learn some basci things about computers
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

get a laptop. If you have moneyz you can get sick gaming ones now.

No offence, but you dont seem too ontop of computer hardware. I wouldnt advise building your own as that can cause serious problems with incompatibilities and whatnot. I would just buy a dell. That goes for laptop or desktop. For being jewish, they do have a good warrenty system

Read full topic

item.title: Wanting to learn some basci things about computers
item.dc:creator: @Coolnoob55 Coolnoob55
item.description:
@Coolnoob55 wrote:

Well it depends, 2.8GHz is pretty low end these days, but if your not looking for performance buying a new hardrive (about $80 for a 250 Gig HD!) is the way to go

item.source: Wanting to learn some basci things about computers

item.title: Wanting to learn some basci things about computers
item.dc:creator: @Coolnoob55 Coolnoob55
item.description:
@Coolnoob55 wrote:

When it comes to computers, ask me ;). GHz is the number of clock cycles your processor can take on in a second, apparently, you computer can take on 2.8 billion clock cycles per second which compared to other computers nowadays is crap
RAM stands for Random Access Memory and serves as fast access to memory, such as in a videogame you see your RAM usage goes up. Hope this somewhat better helps you to understand computers Simples things, they are.

Read full topic
